name: OESE
description: OESE - The space survival game about decisions and consequences.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Monitor capable of 1280 x 720
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: a nice cofeebreak game, this game is pretty simple in its own. it's not that difficult to progress far in the game. all is a matter of good decision to make, if you're not idiot you'll learn quickly what choice to make for each event. progressing in the game is just a matter of good choices and some luck.  a fair price for a descent small game.

A neat little game. I like the concept a lot. Doesn't take too long to beat Normal Mode once you figure out how it all works (I haven't delved into True Mode yet) but it only costs a few quid and kills a couple of hours, so it's well worth it.
Meh not the best not the worst i cant really recommend it but its not a bad game just needs to tell you what choice your going to make if your makeing a choice
